name: Zombie Toon City
description:
A Third Person Zombie Shooter! Fight the Hordes, Balance your PowerUps, Survive!

 Can you make it to safety?

GIVE US FEEDBACK <3 Thanks for Playing!

-- Video to Full Gameplay --

In a world full of zombies wanting to eat your flesh, you heard of a way out of the main lands to safety.  Are you up to the task?

Game is still buggy, if you find bugs or issues we'd love to hear it! Feel free to give us feedback in the comments or in the  Google Survey below!
